mapper.select: select tbM.STRMEMBERID AS strMemberid, tbM.STRREALNAME AS strRealname, tbM.STRIDCARD AS strIdcard, tbM.STRMOBILE AS strMobile, tbM.INTAGE AS intAge, tbM.STRMEMBERCARDNUM AS strMembercardnum, tbM.STRLEVELSID AS strLevelsid, tbM.INTSEX AS intSex, tbM.INTSTATUS AS intStatus, tbM.INTINTEGRAL AS intIntegral, tbM.DBALANCE AS dBalance, tbM.DAFTERSTOREDBALANCE as dAfterStoredBalance, tbML.STRLEVELSNAME as strLevelsname FROM tb_member as tbM,tb_member_levels as tbML where tbM.STRLEVELSID=tbML.strLevelsId and tbM.INTSTATUS=1 and tbML.intStatus=1 and tbM.STRMEMBERID=#{strMemberId}
select count(strVoucherUseInfoId) from tb_voucherticket_useinfo where strMemberId=#{strMemberId} and iIsValid=1 and iStat=1 and strValidEndTime>=now()
select count(strVoucherUseInfoId) from tb_voucherticket_useinfo where strMemberId=#{strMemberId} and iIsValid=1 and iStat=2 and (iUsedCount<iCanUseCount) and strValidEndTime>=now()

select count(strSignId) from tb_member_sign where strMemberId=#{strMemberId} and (STR_TO_DATE(strSignTime,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') between date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') and date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'));
select strSignId, strMemberId, strSignTime, iSignCount, iTotalSignCount from tb_member_sign where strMemberId=#{strMemberId} order by strSignTime DESC limit 0,1
mapper.insert: insert into tb_member_sign ( strSignId, strMemberId, strSignTime, iSignCount, iTotalSignCount ) values ( #{strSignId}, #{strMemberId}, #{strSignTime}, #{iSignCount}, #{iTotalSignCount} )
mapper.select: select strSignId, strSignDays, strStatus, iIntegration, strEnabled, strCreationTime, strLastAccessedTime, strEmployeeId, strEmployeeName, strEmployeeRealName from tb_sign_integration_rule where strStatus=#{strStatus} and strEnabled=#{strEnabled}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_integral_change_record ( STRRECORDID, STRMEMBERID, STRMEMBERCARDNUM, STRMEMBERNAME, INTINTEGRAL, STRDESC, STRINSERTTIME ) values ( #{strRecordId}, #{strMemberId}, #{strMemberCardNum}, #{strMemberName}, #{iIntegralNum}, #{strDesc}, #{strInsertTime} )
mapper.select: select tbM.STRMEMBERID AS strMemberid, tbM.STRREALNAME AS strRealname, tbM.STRIDCARD AS strIdcard, tbM.STRMOBILE AS strMobile, tbM.INTAGE AS intAge, tbM.STRMEMBERCARDNUM AS strMembercardnum, tbM.STRLEVELSID AS strLevelsid, tbM.INTSEX AS intSex, tbM.INTSTATUS AS intStatus, tbM.INTINTEGRAL AS intIntegral, tbM.DBALANCE AS dBalance, tbM.DAFTERSTOREDBALANCE as dAfterstoredbalance, tbM.STRINSERTTIME as strInserttime from tb_member as tbM where STRMEMBERID=#{strMemberId} and INTSTATUS=1
mapper.update: update tb_member set STRREALNAME=#{strRealname}, STRIDCARD=#{strIdcard}, STRMOBILE=#{strMobile}, INTAGE=#{intAge}, STRMEMBERCARDNUM=#{strMembercardnum}, STRLEVELSID=#{strLevelsid}, INTSEX=#{intSex}, INTSTATUS=#{intStatus}, INTINTEGRAL=#{intIntegral}, DBALANCE=#{dBalance}, STRINSERTTIME=#{strInserttime}, STRUPDATETIME=#{strUpdatetime}, DAFTERSTOREDBALANCE=#{dAfterstoredbalance} where STRMEMBERID=#{strMemberid}
mapper.select: select strSignId, strSignDays, strStatus, iIntegration, strEnabled, strCreationTime, strLastAccessedTime, strEmployeeId, strEmployeeName, strEmployeeRealName from tb_sign_integration_rule where strStatus=#{strStatus} and strEnabled=#{strEnabled}
select count(strSignId) from tb_member_sign where strMemberId=#{strMemberId}
select strSignId, strMemberId, strSignTime, iSignCount, iTotalSignCount from tb_member_sign where strMemberId=#{strMemberId} order by strSignTime DESC limit 0,1
select strSignId, strMemberId, strSignTime, iSignCount, iTotalSignCount from tb_member_sign where strMemberId=#{strMemberId} and strSignTime>=#{strStartTime} and strSignTime<#{strEndTime}

select strVoucherUseInfoId, strVoucherTicketId, strVoucherTicketName, strValidEndTime, strMemberId, strMemberName, iStat, iExpired, iCanUseCount, iUsedCount, iIsValid, strUseCountDesc, strRuleDesc, strReserved from tb_voucherticket_useinfo where strMemberId=#{strMemberId} and iStat=#{iState}

select strVoucherTicketId, strVoucherTicketName, dVoucherTicketAmount, strValidEndTime, iIsValid, iCanUseCount, strRuleDesc, strReserved, strEmployeeId, strEmployeeName, strEmployeeRealName, strCreationTime, strLastAccessedTime from tb_voucherticket_infomanage where strVoucherTicketId=#{strVoucherTicketId} and iIsValid=1
